body.name: OQQ Women's 2 Piece Butt Lifting Yoga Leggings Workout High Waist Tummy Control Ruched Booty Pants
features: [Main Fabric] - This leggings made with lightweight,moisture-wicking power fabric.High elasticity, Comfortable, Breathable,Dry,The 4-way stretch to promote both compression and butt lifting, upper leg muscles and reduce muscle vibrations.
[Super flattering]-Yoga leggings are designed with high-rise, tummy control wide waistband contours your curves and streamlines your shape.
[Moisture-wicking]-Thick material,breathable and stretchy seamless knit fabric ,super stretch yet compressive and supportive;and provides complete coverage.
[Butt Lifting Design]-Cute and playful smiling hip line, Comfortable,perfectly snug and flattering fit.Plus a butt lifting feature,It gives your butt a streamlined look like a Juicy peach.
[Occasion]-The leggings are suitable for casual,daily wear or everyday active lifestyle. Just imagine, on nice day, when you wear in these casual shorts, you will look more youthful and vigorous
body.description: Sexy butt lift women's yoga leggings can be a perfect companion with different style outfits. This sports bra active shorts set definitely make you looks sexy, stylish and fashionable during your gym. Great Valentine's birthday Christmas thanksgiving gift idea for women,mother,seniors,teen girls,friends. Yoga set can be used in the gym Pilates studio, outdoor sports and daily leisure places.SIZE CHART S :Waist: 23.7"-25.7"; Hipline: 26.7"-28.7",Inseams:23" M : Waist: 25.7"-27.7"; Hipline: 28.7"-30.7",Inseams:23.5" L : Waist: 27.7"-29.7"; Hipline: 30.7"-32.7",Inseams:24" Please refer to the size chart of the description before purchase.If you prefer a "Loose Fit", please order one SIZE UP than you normally wear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars leggings you got to have!
reviews.reviewText: So I'm pretty picky about my legging but I saw a review on these legging so I thought I'd order one pair. Ill be honestly, When I received my legging I was surprised by the material and I felt I got ripped off BUT I tried them on anyways. I couldn't believe how beautiful they fit, The material hugs your curves. The compress on the tummy is perfect. They don't ris at the ancient whe I'm active, best of all they are NOT see through. These have to be my favorite legging I own. I have since ordered another pair and ordered the body suit this company has. Same thing with their body suit. gorgeous. You will love these leggings. I ordered a med in these leggings, I'm 5'6 165lbs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Favorite Pants to workout in
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. These are the most comfortable, breathable tights to workout in. They rarely roll down. My only issue is that both are developing small tears in the crotch so they are not lasting as long as I'd hoped. I would still order more though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’M BUYING THEM IN EVERY COLOR!!
reviews.reviewText: These are the best leggings I’ve bought in my entire life and trust me!! I’ve been through many! They make your bum look soooo good!! When I received them, at first glance I didn’t think they were gonna fit but BOY was I wrong!! They have some REAL STRETCH to them. For reference.. I’m 140 lbs. 5’5 I ordered a size Small. They fit perfect! Buy them! You won’t regret it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the black ones but the second time I put on the green ones the butt scrunch seam ripped 😞 I think I just got a defective pair as I have worn the black ones multiple times with no issues. I have lost 120 lbs and they help me look like I have a butt and toned thighs!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice for a while
reviews.reviewText: I LOVED them, however, after a few washes, they started to tear a bit at the waistline and ankles. I loved they way they fit, super comfortable and not see-through at all which is also a huge plus!Great for working out, everyday wear or even under a dress in the Winter or Fall seasons.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love these leggings, they are comfortable and fit perfectly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Unflattering design and fit
reviews.reviewText: So, I think we all came to purchase these leggings with the same thing in mind. Cute workout leggings that flatter accentuate the booty.Unfortunately these are just not a quality option in my opinion. I bought my normal size and I feel like they fit well, they just didn’t look good. The “lines” on the back don’t look the same as in the photos. It’s actually two big circles that go over your butt cheeks and then two lines underneath your butt cheeks of the same material. It’s like a big sign that screams “hey! My butt is out! Look at this butt!!!”. To make matters worse, the circles around the butt are also sheer when you bend over lmao so it’s just a lot going on. Personally someone who already has a nice sized behind, it’s too much for me to be comfortable wearing this in any public space.Also, the scrunch in the back just kinda sat on top of my butt if that makes sense lol. The leggings also didn’t provide any lift or shaping so it was very unflattering overall. I was super excited for these so I’m pretty disappointed but I will likely be returning and looking elsewhere for a similar but better pair.**ignore the mess by my door. I came home and immediately tried these on lmao

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am 5’6 165lbs and I got a small. I have thighs and booty so these leggings flatter your natural shape. I love how slimming they make my body look. Absolutely LOVE!!! My only complaint is that the it doesn’t stay up very well, it tends to roll down if you have to bend. Maybe not great for working out but great if you want to lounge around or run errands.
My granddaughter loves them , tight where they should be but loose where they need to be
